name: Love Choice - Decision Stories
description:
Love is a choice!
It is an episode of the life of each of us. We are inspired by this feeling to make choices, to accept decisions, and to be romantic. Love awakens our dreams and imagination. It drives our passion to write more great love stories, and all the time it's been something worth living for.

So what will you do for love?
- choose your interactive stories;
- make your storyline full of drama, romance and dreams;
- customize and dress up your character;
- seek the best way to make a good choices;
- remember, every decision and every choice matters;
- so be romance and find a true love.
